text: Q-Line Biotech Limited

s. License (Form MD-9) Endorsement No. 4 and bearing no. MFG/IVD/2020/000083 issued on April 05, 2024 to manufacture or for sale or for distribution of the following Class C or Class D medical devices issued to the Company under Rule 25 of the Medical Devices Rules, 2017. *@
